cardsData.title: Travel video contents media
cardsData.discription: During steaming video, each contents will be showed up the lists under the video player. This is a simple concept of Video + blog

cardsData.title: bricklayers
cardsData.shortDiscription: a concept for idea shaing and brain storming
cardsData.discription: Bricklayers is focused on to solve local and small size of issues rapidly. It is working as brainstorming with a short sentence of questions and ideas or solutions. Each answer can have branches for the detailed or developed and better solutions.

cardsData.title: language learning web app
cardsData.shortDiscription: languagelearning web-app UX UI designed for a promotional page, sign-in sign-up slide page.
cardsData.discription: Power English wants to build mobile version of poromotion web-app. The first page focuses on giving information about course promotion. If the user like to join the class, directly register at modal signup page or slide menu. The slide menu also works as a private course manager pannel at one place.

cardsData.title: Atlantic Canada Socks Pettern
cardsData.shortDiscription: Socks pattern design for gift or souvenior
cardsData.discription: Pattern design for Atlantic trading post. This pattern is applied for gift socks. The whale and tall ship symbols represent Atlantic Canada.

cardsData.title: Bure-go BI
cardsData.shortDiscription: Brand Identity design for the restaurent
cardsData.discription: Bure-go mainly serves modern japanese style Don-Katz and Soba noodle. The old look caligraphy represent their history and proud of master's tasty.

cardsData.title: Cosemei BI
cardsData.shortDiscription: Brand Identity and packaging design for the cosmetic brand
cardsData.discription: Yua-mi trading wanted to have their private brand for global distribute cosmetic products. The major selling products are contained medical injection look packaging. I intended to show their medical specialty blooms beauty on the logo.

cardsData.title: Amuse Travel
cardsData.shortDiscription: Amuse Travel logo and app design
cardsData.discription: Amuse Travel is a travel vanture company for disabilites. I designed and directed their CI, printings, Web designs and app.

cardsData.title: KLPA catalog and brochure
cardsData.shortDiscription: KLPA logo renewal, brochure, catalog design
cardsData.discription: KLPA requested a modern and fancy style of company catalog and brochure but not too casual. I serviced their printings with renewed logo and guideline.

cardsData.title: eurim Inc CI renewal
cardsData.shortDiscription: Eurim Inc logo renew. Eurim Inc is about eco friendly active charchol handling and retailing company.
cardsData.discription: Eurim did not have an offical CI before. This was team project. I took a part of symbol logo development positions. 20% of contrubution.

cardsData.title: Hanju Brew bottle package
cardsData.shortDiscription: Hanju brew Inc bottle and packaging design for their ginseng liquor line.
cardsData.discription: I designed the background hand illustration, emlem for a certification, graphic packaging, bottle, and label design. 90% contribution.

cardsData.title: Hanju CI
cardsData.discription: Hanju Brew requested a new logo that customer feel comportable and friendly. The orange color of symbol logo represent Hanju brew's classical craftmanship and the semi-serif style of Korean chractor gives an image that customers easily access. 90% of contribution.
